Scarecrow

AI Engineer

June 2024 - Present

Project Team: USC Advanced Games Project

Genre: Third-Person Stealth Game

Engine: Unity

Version Control: Perforce

Coding Language: C#

Special Skills: Behavior Designer, A* Pathfinding Project Pro

Release Platform: Steam

Scarecrow is a USC Advanced Games Project in which you play as a scarecrow and protect your bird feeder from greedy squirrels!

Scarecrow seeks to capture the mischievous stealth of Untitled Goose Game, with the player using their flight-centric movement and various traps to ambush invading squirrels and give them the fright of their lives!

As an AI Engineer I am responsible for:

  • Working with our AI Designer to implement squirrel's various behaviors (idle/invading/alarmed/scared/etc...) using Behavior Designer to implement our enemy AI behavior trees
  • Working with other engineers to ensure the smooth AI integration with the rest of the game (ex. Squirrel perception of the player through sight/hearing)
  • Investigating and fixing bugs in the game (version control errors, game crashes, etc...)
